description:
Orquestra Imperial is a Brazilian big band (with 19 musicians and singers, including the Brazilian actress and pop star Thalma de Freitas and the samba veteran Wilson das Neves) that plays the old-school dancehall samba style called Gafieira.

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Carnaval sÃƒÂ³ ano que vemÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (2007) is Orquestra Imperial's debut album. The 14 tracks include original songs by several of the performers along with a few gafieira classics. The record sustains a spirited 'live' sound that blends voices, acoustic and electric guitars and keyboards, horns, woodwinds and plenty of percussion. 

In the marvelous way that much of the best Brazilian music does, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Carnaval sÃƒÂ³ ano que vemÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ sounds simultaneously nostalgic and cutting-edge.
